id.app_popup_error_message: Maaf, telah terjadi kesalahan. Silakan coba beberapa saat lagi
id.app_popup_logout_message: Jika kamu keluar, kamu harus masuk kembali lagi!
id.app_subtitle_satisfaction: Kenali lebih banyak tentang Slaapdoss dan hal-hal yang paling kami hargai.
id.app_content_satisfaction_desc_1: Mulai dari verifikasi data, pemesanan, pembayaran, hingga check-in dan masih banyak lagi; semuanya terintegrasi dalam satu aplikasi sederhana.
id.app_content_satisfaction_desc_2: Personalisasikan ruangan Anda dengan fitur-fitur berteknologi tinggi kami: lampu suasana hati, kunci pintu QR, dan banyak lagi melalui S-Pad dan ponsel Anda!
id.app_content_satisfaction_desc_3: Dua kata yang paling menggambarkan kami: kebersihan yang luar biasa. Yakinlah, kenyamanan dan keamanan Anda adalah prioritas utama kami.
id.app_content_satisfaction_desc_4: Tuan rumah kami selalu dapat dihubungi dalam satu panggilan telepon. Cukup tinggalkan obrolan melalui DM di aplikasi kami dan beri tahu mereka apa yang Anda butuhkan.
id.app_home_title_perfect_solition: Temukan Solusi Sempurna untuk Setiap Kebutuhan Anda
id.app_home_sub_title_perfect_solition: Dari tempat yang terasa seperti rumah di kota-kota yang ramai hingga menjelajahi keindahan alam Indonesia, Slaapdoss siap membawa Anda ke petualangan dengan kenyamanan penuh di mana pun Anda berada.
id.app_home_cabin_sub_title: Tinggalkan hiruk pikuk kota dan saksikan keindahan eksotis keajaiban alam Indonesia di Slaapdoss. Hargai pemandangan menakjubkan langsung dari kehangatan kabin Anda.
id.app_home_cabin_head_title_2: Rumah Anda saat jauh dari rumah
id.app_home_cabin_sub_title_2: Membawa pengalaman hidup bersama ke tingkat yang baru, Slaapdoss dilengkapi dengan fitur-fitur berteknologi tinggi khas kami untuk kenyamanan maksimal. Dijamin bikin betah.
id.app_home_banner_title_1: Sudut pandang pribadi Anda ke Rinjani dari kabin Anda
id.app_home_banner_sub_title_1: Kabin dengan kursi baris depan menuju keajaiban alam.
id.app_home_banner_title_2: Anggaplah Seperti Rumah Sendiri Kemanapun Anda Pergi
id.app_home_banner_sub_title_2: Carilah kehangatan di mana pun Anda berada; baik itu di kota yang ramai atau di huta.
id.app_respose_payment_success: Selamat orderan anda berhasil, silahkan lakukan pembayaran sebelum waktu berakhir!
id.app_login_sign_in_subtitle: Liburan menakjubkan Kamu akan dimulai di sini
id.app_sign_up_sub_titile_response_success: Silahkan masuk dan nikmati fitur-fitur canggih
id.app_forgot_password_paragraf_info: Masukkan alamat email terverifikasi akun pengguna Anda dan kami akan mengirimkan Anda tautan pengaturan ulang kata sandi.
id.app_forgot_password_success_title_messag: Permintaan pengaturan ulang kata sandi berhasil
id.app_forgot_password_success_text_message: Silakan periksa email Anda untuk mengatur ulang kata sandi Anda!
id.app_forgot_password_popup_message_succes: Cek email kamu untuk merubah kata sandi baru!
id.app_reset_password_popup_message_success: Password kamu berhasil di ubah, silahkan login dengan kata sandi baru!
id.app_reset_password_sub_title: Masukan kata sandi yang rumit dan aman
id.app_user_profile_text_warning_update_dat: Silakan ubah data di bawah ini sesuai dengan data pribadi Anda. Jika ada kesalahan pada data dibawah ini silahkan di rubah dan pastikan datanya valid!
id.app_reservation_title_warning_duration: Anda belum memasukkan tanggal checkin dan checkout
id.app_reservation_message_warning_duration: Jika dilanjutkan, akan check in hari ini dan check out besok
id.app_reservation_payment_va_bca_desc: Pembayaran melalui ATM BCA atau Internet Banking
id.app_reservation_payment_va_bri_desc: Pembayaran melalui BRI ATM, M-Banking, atau Internet Banking
id.app_reservation_payment_va_bni_desc: Pembayaran melalui ATM BNI atau Internet Banking
id.app_reservation_message_empty_payment_me: Silahkan pilih metode pembayaran terlebih dahulu
id.app_reservation_not_verified_account: Akun Anda belum diverifikasi. Harap verifikasi akun Anda di halaman profil pengguna
id.app_payment_response_pending_reservation: Reservasi akan diproses setelah Anda menyelesaikan pembayaran
id.app_detail_cabin_title_reschedule_and_ca: Pengembalian Dana, Penjadwalan Ulang, Relokasi, dan Pembatalan
id.app_detail_cabin_text_empty_room: Maaf, kamar pada tanggal yang Anda pilih tidak tersedia. Silakan pilih tanggal lain atau ubah lokasi
id.dashboard_list_banner_text_question_dele: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus spanduk ini?
id.dashboard_list_banner_text_question_upda: Apakah kamu yakin ingin mengubah status banner ini?
id.dashboard_list_banner_message_question_u: Jika anda merubah nya menjadi Private maka user tidak bisa melihat banner ini
id.dashboard_list_banner_message_question_d: Jika anda sudah menghapus ini, tidak akan bisa dikembalikan lagi
id.message_error_invalid_image_type: Jenis gambar tidak valid. Hanya JPEG, PNG, dan JPG yang diperbolehkan.
id.accomodation_policy_refund_reschedule_te: Tidak tersedia. Pemesanan kamar ini tidak dapat dibatalkan, dikembalikan, direlokasi, atau dijadwalkan ulang. Jika Anda tidak tiba di akomodasi pada tanggal check-in, Anda akan dianggap tidak datang dan tidak akan diberikan refund.
id.accomodation_policy_age_policies_one_tex: Anak-anak berusia di atas 10 tahun akan dianggap sebagai orang dewasa
id.accomodation_policy_age_policies_two_tex: Anak-anak harus berada di bawah pengawasan orang tua sepanjang waktu selama berada di kabin
id.accomodation_policy_other_policies_break: Sarapan tidak disediakan. Anda dapat memesan secara terpisah atau membayar kamar dengan tambahan saat pemesanan.
id.accomodation_policy_other_policies_smoki: Merokok di dalam kamar tidak diperbolehkan. Merokok diperbolehkan di area luar ruangan.
id.sub_title_form_change_password: Pastikan kata sandi baru Anda sangat aman!!!

en.title_form_change_password: For the security of your reservation
en.sub_title_form_change_password: Make sure your new password is very secure!!!
en.app_response_internal_server_error: An error occurred on the internal server
en.app_popup_error_message: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again later
en.app_popup_logout_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
en.app_popup_logout_message: If you log out, you have to log back in again!
en.app_subtitle_satisfaction: Get to know more about Slaapdoss and the things we value most.
en.app_content_satisfaction_desc_1: From data verification, booking, payment, to check-in and many more; everything is integrated in one simple application.
en.app_content_satisfaction_desc_2: Personalize your room with our high-tech features: mood lamp, QR door lock, and more through our S-Pad and your phone!
en.app_content_satisfaction_desc_3: Two words that best describe us: great hygiene. Rest assured, your comfort and safety are our top priorities.
en.app_content_satisfaction_desc_4: Our hosts are always one call away. Simply leave a chat through the DM in our application and let them know what you need.
en.app_home_title_perfect_solition: Find the Perfect Solution for Your Every Need
en.app_home_sub_title_perfect_solition: From a place to call home in lively cities to exploring Indonesia’s natural beauty, Slaapdoss is prepared to bring you to an adventure with utter comfort no matter where you are.
en.app_home_cabin_head_title: Feel the healing touch of mother nature
en.app_home_cabin_sub_title: Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and witness the exotic beauty of Indonesia’s natural wonders at Slaapdoss. Appreciate the breathtaking scenery right from the warmth of your cabin.
en.app_home_cabin_sub_title_2: Taking the co-living experience to a new level, Slaapdoss is equipped with our signature high-tech features for maximum comfort. Guaranteed to make you feel at home.
en.app_home_title_search_select: Where do you want to stay?
en.app_respose_payment_success: Congratulations, your order is successful, please make payment before the end of time!
en.app_login_sign_in_subtitle: Your amazing staycation will begin here
en.app_sign_up_sub_titile_response_success: Please log in to enjoy superior features
en.app_forgot_password_paragraf_info: Enter your user account's verified email address and we will send you a password reset link.
en.app_forgot_password_success_text_message: Please check your email to reset your password!
en.app_forgot_password_popup_message_succes: Check Your Email for reset password!
en.app_reset_password_popup_message_success: Your password updated successfully, please login again with new password!
en.app_reset_password_sub_title: Enter a complex and secure password
en.app_user_profile_text_warning_update_dat: Please change the data below according to your personal data. If there are errors in the data below, please change them and make sure the data is valid!
en.app_user_profile_title_success_submit_id: Yey, your data has been verified!!!
en.app_user_profile_message_success_submit_: You can book a cabin now!
en.app_reservation_title_warning_duration: You have not entered checkin and checkout dates
en.app_reservation_message_warning_duration: If continued, will check in today and check out tomorrow
en.app_reservation_payment_va_bca_desc: Pay at ATM BCA or Internet Banking
en.app_reservation_payment_va_bri_desc: Payment through BRI ATM, M-Banking, or Internet Banking
en.app_reservation_payment_va_bni_desc: Pay at ATM BNI or Internet Banking
en.app_reservation_message_empty_payment_me: Please select a payment method first
en.app_reservation_not_verified_account: Your account has not been verified. Please verify your account on the user profile page
en.app_payment_response_pending_reservation: Reservation will be processed after you complete the payment
en.app_detail_cabin_text_empty_room: Sorry, The Room On The Date You Selected Is Not Available. Please Choose Another Date Or Change Location
en.dashboard_list_banner_text_question_dele: Are you sure you want to remove this banner?
en.dashboard_list_banner_text_question_upda: Are you sure you want to change the status of this banner?
en.dashboard_list_banner_message_question_u: If you change it to Private then users cannot see this banner
en.dashboard_list_banner_message_question_d: If you have deleted this, it will not be able to be restored
en.message_error_invalid_image_type: Invalid image type. Only JPEG, PNG, and JPG are allowed.
en.accomodation_policy_refund_reschedule_te: Not available. This room booking can't be cancelled, refunded, relocated, or rescheduled. If you don't arrive at the accommodation on the check-in date, you will be considered a no-show and will not be given a refund.
en.accomodation_policy_age_policies_one_tex: Children above 10 years old will be considered as an adult
en.accomodation_policy_age_policies_two_tex: Children must be under parents supervision all the time during the stay at cabin
en.accomodation_policy_other_policies_break: Breakfast is not provided. You can order separately or pay room with add-ons during booking.
en.accomodation_policy_other_policies_smoki: Smoking inside room is not allowed. Smoking is allowed in the outdoor area.
